attributes.action: Provide to all pensioners, information, on what can be claimed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is most important that all pensioners, are made aware of what they are entitled to claim, when they reach the state pension age. It may be they are not entitled to some, but at least they should be sent out a list, ensuring they have the correct information, to hand, including all contacts.
